meanings.sent1: The money in my savings account is withdrawable whenever I need it.
meanings.sent2: The ATM allows for withdrawable cash transactions.
meanings.sent3: I found a magic piggy bank that makes all coins withdrawable with a wave of a wand!
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was like a withdrawable emotion, easily taken out when needed.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawable nature of the offer made it too tempting to resist.

meanings.definition: Capable of being taken out or removed
meanings.sent1: The stain on the carpet was not withdrawable no matter how hard I tried.
meanings.sent2: The screws were withdrawable with the right tool.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a withdrawable cake from the oven sounded like a delicious experiment.
meanings.sent4: His words were like withdrawable arrows, piercing through her defenses.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawable weeds in the garden made it easy to clean up.
